xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
Class IdentityTIdManager

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.IdentityTIdManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TIdManager, Convertable
public class IdentityTIdManager
extends Object
implements TIdManager

This class implements the TIdManager interface and always returns the same Object (identity). This is useful when there is no translation between logical and physical Ids.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
protected  FixedSizeConverter idConverter
          Converter for the objects inside the TIds.
 
Constructor Summary

          Creates a new IdentityTIdManager.
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the TIdManager.
 FixedSizeConverter getIdConverterInsideTIds()
          Returns a converter for the identifyer which occur inside TIds.
 int getIdSize()
          Returns the size of the ids in bytes.
 Iterator ids()
          null is returned, because this is an identity mapping between Ids and TIds.
 Object insert(TId tid)
          Inserts a new TId and returns an identifyer.
 FixedSizeConverter objectIdConverter()
          Returns a converter for the ids which are translated by the manager into TIds.
 TId query(Object id)
          Translates an identifyer into a tuple identifyer (here, the id has to be a tuple identifyer and the reference to the same object is returned ==> identity).
 void read(DataInput dataInput)
          There is nothing to read (no state).
 void remove(Object id)
          Signals that the identifier is no longer needed.
 void removeAll()
          Signals that all identifiers are no longer needed.
 void update(Object id, TId newTId)
          Signals that an identifyer gets a new tuple identifyer.
 boolean useLinks()
          Determines if the TIdManager uses TId-Links.
 void write(DataOutput dataOutput)
          There is nothing to write (no state).

Returns:
a converter for the identifyer which occur inside TIds.

query

public TId query(Object id)
Translates an identifyer into a tuple identifyer (here, the id has to be a tuple identifyer and the reference to the same object is returned ==> identity).

Specified by:
query in interface TIdManager
Parameters:
id - identifyer
Returns:
the same tuple identifyer

ids

public Iterator ids()
null is returned, because this is an identity mapping between Ids and TIds.

Specified by:
ids in interface TIdManager
Returns:

insert

public Object insert(TId tid)
Inserts a new TId and returns an identifyer. Here, the identity is returned.

Specified by:
insert in interface TIdManager
Parameters:
tid - tuple identifyer
Returns:
the same object

update

public void update(Object id,
                   TId newTId)
Signals that an identifyer gets a new tuple identifyer. Here, there is nothing to do.

Specified by:
update in interface TIdManager
Parameters:
id - The identifyer used inside the application.
newTId - The new tuple identifyer inside the RecordManager.

remove

public void remove(Object id)
Signals that the identifier is no longer needed. Here, there is nothing to do.

Specified by:
remove in interface TIdManager
Parameters:
id - the identifyer which has been given out is no longer needed by the RecordManager.

removeAll

public void removeAll()
Signals that all identifiers are no longer needed.

Specified by:
removeAll in interface TIdManager

close

public void close()
Closes the TIdManager. There is nothing to do.

Specified by:
close in interface TIdManager

useLinks

public boolean useLinks()
Determines if the TIdManager uses TId-Links. This is only possible iff the Ids to be translated are TIds.

Specified by:
useLinks in interface TIdManager
Returns:
true iff links are uses inside the RecordManager.

objectIdConverter

public FixedSizeConverter objectIdConverter()
Returns a converter for the ids which are translated by the manager into TIds.

Specified by:
objectIdConverter in interface TIdManager
Returns:
a converter for serializing the identifiers, here tuple identifyers.

Returns the size of the ids in bytes.

Specified by:

Returns:
the size in bytes of each id.
